website_summaries.verdict: The long-lasting eyeliner lives up to the hype.
pros: The pointed-tip brush produces fine, crisp lines
Flexible tip glides on smoothly and is ideal for producing the perfect, long-lasting cat eye
Both the black and brown colors are bold and highly pigmented
Eyeliner stays on all day even after vigorous activity
cons: Eyeliner should be stored upside down to avoid drying out quickly

website_summaries.verdict: The most beloved eyeliner on the internet, reviewers praised this eyeliner for sticking through everything.
pros: This waterproof liquid eyeliner is famed for not running, fading, or melting no matter what you put it through
Easy to use and goes on smooth
Super-thin applicator also makes it easy to build a subdued or dramatic line
cons: The eyeliner needs to be replaced more often than some other brands, as reviewers noted that it dries out fast

customer_reviews.title: Continuously dried out product
customer_reviews.text: Dried out. This is the second time I've purchased liquid eyeliner from Amazon. And it's the second time it has arrived dried out. The first one was Stilla brand. I love both of these brands and will buy them at the store. But Amazon has a problem with either old product or storage procedures. Buy the product. Don't buy it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product negative stars. This product is advertised as waterproof but absolutely is not. I applied this product in the morning at 8 am and by 9 am it was running off. This wasn’t after swimming, showering, working out, or anything else that would cause makeup to run, it was after driving to work in my car. I tried applying before and after concealer and with a setting spray and I could still not get it to stay on. I should have known it wasn’t waterproof when I opened the package and got some on my finger and was able to wipe it right off with my other finger.
customer_reviews.author: ShoniShopper

customer_reviews.title: It is new and feels like it was dried and used
customer_reviews.text: The color is dark and strong but the problem is that it drags my skin as I apply it. It is new and feels like it was dried and used. I read about it online and saw that others faced the same issue. I have heard that the "ink" liner by KVD is better than this tattoo liner and doesnt dry and drag on the skin when you are applying. It also didnt last all day on my oily lids. I think it would work for dry skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Kat Von D Trooper eyeliner for about a year. I wear it everyday even to my 10-12hr warehouse job and have never had any problems. I typically go through it every 3 months. I've been known for my cat eye makeup so this definitely didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: lxndra

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this product has just been sitting somewhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product has just been sitting somewhere for months before being shipped but it went dry very quickly, where when I order it directly off of kat von d's site ot stays fresh for much longer. I only had it for a month and it's gone. Definitely the real product but seems very old or something. And overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product. I am very disapointed and will probably never order anything else from Kat Von D. This was a lot of money to spend on eyeliner for me. The eyeliner did not last even half a day. The eyeliner seemed almost dried up as I kept having to press really hard to get it on. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Drier than a Desert in 4 Days
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product was sold used, is counterfeit or just had some sort of manufacturing defect. My Wife uses this and typically purchases it from a brick and mortar Sephora. She loves it. We ordered this as a replacement when she began to run low. There were no issues with deliveries. After 3 - 4 days of use, she informed me that it had run dry. There was apparently less liner in the "new" tube than the "old". I would return it, but it's too much of a hassle. It'll be easier to trash it and just stick with the brick and mortar store version.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT. SCAM FOR SURE.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the real Kat Von D trooper liner. Terrible product. Used it twice and already fading when using the felt tip. I have had the original for months now and it is still going compared to whatever knockoff this was. Very shameful scam. It was also the same price as the real Kat Von D. Do not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Winnn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not easy to use. I like my $8 Almay ones WAY better. This thing is super meh and gets in all your eye creases...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Why You Buggin'?

customer_reviews.title: Seemed dry and old
customer_reviews.text: OK so I ordered this product because I have bought it several times before at Sephora and I liked it. However when I received this particular eyeliner from this seller it seemed as if it was old and it was somewhat dry in the beginning. It took me several times going over the same line to get it to fill in. I was having to use my other (old) eyeliners more to get it right. Therefore I stopped using this eyeliner and kept turning into my other ones. Every once in a while I’ll try to use it and it’s just crap! I will never order this from the seller ever again. Save your money and shop wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Corfish

customer_reviews.title: Completely dried out
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this due to multiple reviews of the eyeliner being dried out however I figured it was just a bad batch. When I received my liner, I realized this was still an ongoing issue. I had to reapply the liner 5-6 times to get it to look somewhat decent. Very disappointing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The product was dried out the second I tried applying it. Complete waste of money. Stick to Maybelline gel.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: NOT long wearing AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress enough how much of a letdown this product was and I can't believe it has gotten so many reviews as lasting all day. It's been hot this week (over 100 every day) and in the 10 minutes I spend outside getting to my office it melts and smudges off. I am bought this after seeing the review from the girl who said it lasted through a car accident, but I am wondering if I somehow got a defective product or if they changed the formula because this stuff doesn't last at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Haas

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner ever. You need to have a steady hand, but I haven't wanted to use any other eyeliner since I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mjk400

customer_reviews.title: The only liner I buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only liquid eyeliner I will buy. It comes off easily but it stays on as long as you don’t accidentally wipe your eye. I have to put on eyeshadow before applying this, otherwise after a minute the liner bleeds onto other areas of my eyelid a little. I always do winged liner pretty thick and this gives me a precise line for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never spent more than 15$ on eyeliner so I was apprehensive. I have to say it was well worth it. I have pretty bad allergies and I am always wiping the corner of my eyes which smears my eyeliner. So far I’ve worn it thru a powerlifting session and I rubbed my eyes after walking my dog - still in tact! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sibby

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust these products!
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I ordered the Kat Von D Tattoo Liner Trooper 0.55 ml/0.019 oz-- a product I had purchased in a store and loved previously. From day one, the liner I got from this vendor was garbage--dried out, inconsistent and basically unusable. I don't know what the issue was, but obviously others have had similar problems. Whatever is going on here, these are lesser versions--don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love - am a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.text: Clean line. Stays where it should all day. Only part bleed or wipe off by end of the day. Wish they also made magnetic with this dispenser because it is not easy for me to do clean lines and winging was always difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B

customer_reviews.title: I GOT THIS BECAUSE OF ANOTHER REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: THE LADY WHO HAD A CAR ACCIDENT BUT HER EYELINER NEVER MOVED THROUGH THE WHOLE THING? AMAZING. I NEEDED THIS BECAUSE OF THAT. HOWEVER. I HAVE HAD NO ACCIDENTS. SO NOT SURE WHY I GOT THIS SINCE I'M NOT PLANNING TO BE IN A CAR ACCIDENT? SO GOOD ON YOU LADY WHO HAD AN ACCIDENT AND AMAZING EYE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNANANANANANANANANANNEEENEEE

customer_reviews.title: Almost like a light black/dark gray
customer_reviews.text: I watched many youtube videos about people going nuts over this eye liner. I don't get the hype. Its much lighter than expected, at least my tube is. Almost like a light black/dark gray. From what I saw on the internet i expected something much much darker. It also feathered a bit which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth $30. Not nearly as waterproof as promoted. Bleeds near the outer corners of my eyes. Tip stops applying the liner sporadically almost ever time I use it now and has to be lightly moistened. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctah

customer_reviews.title: Dried up in 2 wks
customer_reviews.text: The last 2 times I’ve ordered this from Amazon it’s lasted about 2 wks before drying up. It’s my fave eyeliner but I’m not paying that much for 2 wks worth of product. I ordered some from Sephora to see if it was the brand change or ordering it from here was the problem. I’ll find out in 2 wks
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Just as good at Makeup Forever's liquid liner in pure black (#13)
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this liquid liner. Just as good at Makeup Forever's liquid liner in pure black (#13), but it is constantly sold out in stores. The Kat Von D is a perfect substitute. Works virtually the same. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Wears off immediately.
customer_reviews.text: This must be either way, way too old or a knock off. This is nothing like this product is supposed to be. Waterproof? Nope. Long lasting? Not at all. I've heard great things about this product generally, and this eyeliner is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: “Brand new” and dried up 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed on this product, this was my second one that I wanted to replace my old one still good, but knew it was time for a new one, and what did I get a dried up liner. I would have expected more for the price since cheaper one are far better then this one was so I will not be duped again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very long lasting eyeliner that's very precise and easy to apply. It isn't very waterproof though, surprisingly. To me it isn't really worth the price while there are very affordable $3 liquid eyeliner pens out there like Essense, which is waterproof and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: gotYOURsix

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a sub-for-santa gift but from what I understand it worked well, looked great, and was easy to both apply and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use as a beginner because it is a firm point instead of a brush that bends while applying. Smooth bold lines!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about receiving and trying this eyeliner and I am SO disappointed by it. I thought I'd give it a try because I heard it was waterproof & a great product from some. I don't know if it's just because I purchased it from Amazon or what but this product is TERRIBLE. I could wipe it completely off with my finger and barely any pressure. When I tried to apply it I couldn't even get a single line out without it drying out/fading. Do not waste your money on this product. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: disappointed...start drying up in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the raving reviews about this product, I was utterly disappointed. After only 2 weeks of using this eyeliner, this eyeliner started to dry up. This has never happened to me before when I bought other brands of eyeliners. I would still give it a 3 stars though for its fine tip and ability to draw smooth lines. But I was expecting it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if it was my individual item. But I used it once and then it started drying out. This is the only liquid liner I have ever used and this has never happened. Next time I'll get it at Sephora like I usually do. It seems Amazon sends out old or rejected product. Will never purchase makeup from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Subpar irregular version of a great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is always my favorite eyeliner. Ordered once through Amazon and it was a horrible consistency and the tip of the brush looked like it was a tiny tangle of hairs. Usually get from Sephora and did a few weeks ago. Still going strong, this liner glides and stays put. Make sure to get the one that’s a brush and not the foam like tip. The brush bends just enough for easy application. I will probably never order it again, too risky and I’m terrible with returns. Sticking to instore purchase on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: After two uses of this eyeliner, the cap/spring started to get stuck to the body of the pen and was difficult to remove. The lid is just not constructed will. The liquid either comes out at an alarming rate or not at all, which has made this eyeliner super unpredictable and difficult to use. When it actually works, it's great. But the issues with the product I received are not worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: The Best Liquid Liner for Winged Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: If you want to do winged eyeliner, this is the pen to purchase. I had it recommended to me at a Sephora store and it's the reason I feel confident doing winged eyeliner. The color is bold and applies beautifully and smoothly. This is worth the price and I won't be going back to other liquid eyeliners.
customer_reviews.author: theinquisitivemom

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best liner, the best black, in the world. I wish it wasn't, I'm not in love with paying this much, but it's the blackest black, the finest line, I gotta have it. The end.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase through amazon ever
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is my holy grail but **Do not ever purchase through amazon the quality is waaaay inferior from buying in the store or from the Kat von d website!!!*** this one didn’t even last 4 weeks, seemed dried out even on first application. I honestly question if it was even an authentic kat von d or just some old janky one that they sent me because I have never had one of these last less than 4 weeks with such faded pigment and dryness. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Yeeet

customer_reviews.title: Dried out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very dried out after initial use. I am now having to dip it in water everytime. Did not happen with the first one I bought directly from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: MLE

customer_reviews.title: Great but emptying out really fast. .
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is amazing. Really stays on. BUT I have only used it maybe a dozen times and it's already running out. I just opened it and always make sure the lid is on. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan, was trying this out instead of stila stay all day liner and when I first got it the package was opened and nothing was there then when I actually received it it lasted about a month before drying out and the top kept coming off.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie

customer_reviews.title: No......Just NO
customer_reviews.text: What the hell?!?! Did y’all send one that was on its last legs?? Did you swap out the ink tubes with the worlds WORST eyeliner?!?! You’ve got to do 17 layers to even see it...but you CANT even do that because as soon as you go to darken it, it rubs off onto the felt tip.....I know this eyeliner is amazing so this review has to do with the seller itself. QUIT SCAMMING PEOPLE
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Strike

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best eyeliner I have ever used. I have a problem with eyeliner staying put because I have hooded eyes. This is the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Kat Von D
customer_reviews.text: A new holy grail liquid eyeliner for me. I've purchased other waterproof liquid eyeliners on the more pricey end, but this one beats it all (and at half the price, from my past purchases). Other waterproof liquid eyeliners I used were slightly irritating on my eyes and they didn't dry as quickly. This guy drys IMMEDIATELY and I have no worries about looking like a panda after hours of wear. Note: I have super oily eyelids. The liquid isn't SUPER pigmented, but that can be fixed easily with a second application/draw.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Was bummed that though there seems to be ink in the pen, the ink is sticky and somehow prevents the liquid from adhering to your skin. It’s almost like it turns into an eyeliner eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of this eyeliner. I feel like it’s dry and not the easiest application process since it is so dry. There are far better, cheaper, other liquid eyeliners on the market than this one.
customer_reviews.author: LaMonze

customer_reviews.title: ... this is authentic but I can confirm that it’s garbage. So streaky
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product so I can’t confirm if this is authentic but I can confirm that it’s garbage. So streaky. Doesn’t last. Absolutely not a high end product.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Not authentic, dried up and didn’t run smooth like the real deal. You can tell by the bottom end of the tube it’s different from original which I looked up after noticing it wasn’t applying the same as 4 previous liners I had.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: I love the tip
customer_reviews.text: I love the tip! It applies so easily and perfectly. My only complaint is that it seems to smudge more tha. Others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Too too too dry
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t put water on the brush, you cannot draw the eye line. I don’t know how it could be so dry. It’s my first time to use the Kat Von D eye liner. I thought it will be the best eye liner since so many people recommended before. Very disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: jasito

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying the eyeliner and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anak

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever: I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an eyeliner that I love! Doesn’t chunk apart or get flaky. It’s smooth and looks great all day. And vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Y. Billner

customer_reviews.title: DRIED OUT
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner is so dried out it’s barely useable. I have purchased this before from Sephora and loved it. I don’t know why this one is so different but DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LINER!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to the whole liquid liner.. But this stuff is absolutely amazing. It stays on all day long, comes off easily with coconut oil (my makeup remover), and is very easy to apply. The price is awesome and frankly so is the name!
customer_reviews.author: Flauna

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this liner
customer_reviews.text: This line was already one of my favorites... I am a liquid liner SNOB! I LOVE this liner! You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: kat von d liquid liner is so easy to put on and the ease of making a ...
customer_reviews.text: kat von d liquid liner is so easy to put on and the ease of making a straight line is wonderful. the quality of the product outstanding
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this liner
customer_reviews.text: Love this liquid liner, I would suggest using primer too but it lasts all day!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I swear by it
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually have to have certain brands for my makeup - most of what I use is generally drugstore, but this I literally swear by this eyeliner. I've been caught in thunderstorms a few times with it and it has held up really nicely. It's also super easy to use and a nice solid color
customer_reviews.author: Sky Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Thin, precise tip black eye liner every girl needs
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye liner I have ever owned hands down. The thin tip makes it so easy to make precise lines thin or thick. And the tip doesn't dry out fast or stop working like some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Asena

customer_reviews.title: Staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eyes and liners that don't dry right away are difficult. Soon as I blink they smear. I also move alot for my job and do perspire a bit. However this stuff stays throughout my entire shift. I have a before and after. As you can see my lipstain faded but the liner stated
customer_reviews.author: jessica muth

customer_reviews.title: Knock off Kat Von D *do not buy*
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a knock off. It’s a completely different size and shape than what I bought in the store, the exact same thing. It was a sunken in felt tip that was dry. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Gave me the wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Tattoo liner and was sent the Dagger liner. Still trying it out it seems pretty good so far and is still pretty easy to wing my liner like the rest of my life. But I will still be ordering Tattoo again but probably from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Masta

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Stays on pretty well but needs time to dry or your eye lid will have a black line across it 😂
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS PERFECT FOR MAKING A CAT-EYE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this previously and I loved it. When it ran out I found on Amazon that others were saying Loreal Lineur Intense worked just the same at only about $7, so I bought it. IT IS NOT THE SAME. The Loreal product is watery, Kat Von D's is not. The tip on the Loreal product is just a little rounded while the Kat Von D liquid liner is exactly precise and pointed, which is what you want when you're doing a cat-eye. I used the Loreal product about 3-4 times and then got fed up. I went right back to Kat Von D. I don't have time in the morning to mess around.
customer_reviews.author: pixierose

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand....when I buy from Sephora. It didn’t seem brand new. I just used it for the third time and it literally feels like I’ve used it thirty times. Buying from Sephora from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kellett

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this in the past, and after using this one ive began to doubt that this product is legit kat von d product. its verrrryy runny
customer_reviews.author: S. Hornyak

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect for it to be this GREAT!! Once I received it which was on ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect for it to be this GREAT!! Once I received it which was on time, i tried a very small thin line on my hand and it didn't smudge nor removed easily, i should rub it off with soap and water to rinse it, and what i also noticed was the tip of the pin wasn't the typical sponge like tip it had a rubber thin tip which is very easy to apply, and the eyeliner it self is very dark black! This is an awsome pen liner truly a tattoo liner, i would totally buy it again if i ran out of this one
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: feels counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: after using this eyeliner for about a week, the cap broke and the eyeliner smudged more often compared to when i buy the actual one in stores. i don't recommend it and just buy the real thing in stores, it's just my suspicion but who knows what could be in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great price
customer_reviews.text: I like the tattoo concept of eyeliner but I wasn't a big fan of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Manz

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s not worth the money, I bought my daughter in law & myself some, it dried up within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Penny D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Glides on Easily
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it stays on and doesn't smear below my eyes. Goes on easily and smooth. Love the brown and the black!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love her tattoo liner that I get from Sephora that usually last me 6 mos. but this one only lasted 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite eyeliner. Hands down best I've ever used in ...
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite eyeliner. Hands down best I've ever used in terms of a liquid liner. I use it every single day. Eyeliner is still going strong at the end of every work day. Fades slightly after several hours of wear but not much.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cieszynski

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day, doesn't smudge. The very tip doesnt stay saturated with product so getting that perfect cat eye is a little challenging. Overall nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I do not feel like this product was authentic. I have always used this eyeliner bought from Sephora and loved it. This was the first time i have purchased from Amazon and i can tell a huge difference. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: nicole verble

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Dried out by the third time I tried to use it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Ledd pigment seemed diluted
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like this had less pigment than the ones I buy at Sephora
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA ZUNIGA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. I have used this product less than two weeks, and not even every day, and it’s already dried up.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and thin line
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! Waterproof actually means waterproof! It stays on and doesn't smear like other eyeliners when it starts to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Komaru

customer_reviews.title: smooth application
customer_reviews.text: This is the second eyeliner of tattoo I have used. love love it! easy to go on, smooth lines. The only down fall is you need to pump the tip into the lid to get more liquid after one eye. But not a big deal for me
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Dried up- not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was completely dried up within 2 weeks and I use minimal liner. I will only be buying my Kat Von D liner from Sephora from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Might try again
customer_reviews.text: Gave it two stars bc it does stick and doesn’t smudge but after using it 4 times ir dried out. Idk if it was old
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this eyeliner because it goes on SO smoothly and ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this eyeliner because it goes on SO smoothly and does not smear or even come off unless you take it off. (Where have you been all my life?) Only downside is that I'm having to wait 3 weeks for it to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Always Learning

customer_reviews.title: WE NEED THIS TO BE BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited. I am looking for the liner that is dark and stays put. This is light and didn't stay put for an hour. RETURN. WHY? WE NEED THIS TO BE BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ann Baade

customer_reviews.title: Drys out in under a month
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this at sephora. The ones from the store last me about 6 months. This one is already drying out. Will not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: This was a defective product, within a week the liner broke and all the product leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: By far the best
customer_reviews.text: I mean, this is the best liquid eyeliner I have ever used. Ever. I dare you to find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora S.

customer_reviews.title: definitely flaky
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with this eyeliner..was expecting a game changer and im sorry its just not..without a primer underneath you will get flaking, its not really matte and its not the best eyeliner ever..im still on the search for the perfect one! Not worth 18.00 stick with covergirl or maybelline on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marie

customer_reviews.title: smears easily
customer_reviews.text: won't last more than 3 hours, maybe more if you are in A/C. If you are sweating or accidentally touch your eyelid, the liner will fade off.....very disappointing as I was very excited for this product
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: KVD products have fallen from glory.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great liner, but the whole brand has really gone downhill. The last 3 I had leaked like crazy and dried out after only a few weeks. You can literally get a better liner by choosing any random drugstore brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Over all good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product concept. Just needs a bit of tweaking on lasting longer
customer_reviews.author: DIANA

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did not apply correctly, dried and clumped if I took too many swipes, rubbed off super quickly. Bad quality. The $5 liquid Milani has worked way better!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Best Liner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect liner! Stays where you put it most of the day and never flecks. It easily removes with water for mistakes. I love this liner!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Satrang

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: My eyeliner came and it had already been opened, the eyeliner hardly worked, seemed dried out. It also didn’t help that it was late getting here. The box it came in was damaged as well. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Ink only lasted 2 months,
customer_reviews.text: Have always used this eyeliner purchased one on October 9,2018. Worked great for 2months now have to shake it to get ant ink out. Also when you open it the spring comes off. Quality was not good this time.
customer_reviews.author: nidia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and removes easily
customer_reviews.text: Changed my view on using liquid liner. Easy to apply and removes easily, but doesn't run. Do yourself a favor and give it a try... my friend turned me on to this eyeliner and I'll never go back. I just hope they never stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to having this eyeliner last longer but it seems to only really last when I have eyeshadow on other than that really good pigment and not too smudgy when wiping off
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was empty
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner I ordered was empty? This bottle was just opened, and the return date has already expired. I would like a new, full eyeliner. I do have pictures of this right after it was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Doerner

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other people said, this came and was already dried out. It feels like an old product and honestly my 6 dollar NYX works 100% better than this. Really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mendez

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner truly is a trooper. It's the only ...
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner truly is a trooper. It's the only eyeliner I've had that doesn't need touching up, even after 8 hours. God bless.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, glides well and stays on over 24 hours. Great liner
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product! No different than any other cheap liquid eyeliner! The price is ridiculous! I expected so much more for this price! You don't always get what you pay for in this case!
customer_reviews.author: Renee D. Durfey

product_meta.title: Kat Von D Tattoo Liner Trooper 0.55 ml/0.019 oz
